forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the cool hours of the early morning, San Francisco sports a partly cloudy cloak, wrapped around it like a modest shawl against the gentle southwestern breeze. The temperature holds steady around a comfortable 53 degrees, hinting at promise as the day unfolds. As the sun rises higher, it will cast its warm gaze over the city, inviting the day to awaken in shades of bright clarity. While the afternoon may cool slightly, a peak of 65 degrees will encourage a soft embrace of warmth, perfectly balanced by the fresh touch of a light west-southwest wind. 

The fog, that charming specter of San Francisco, plays coy today. Although its presence is muted, whispers of the marine layer might linger near the edges, especially closer to the iconic Golden Gate. Perhaps one might find a gentle mist along the coastline, lending a serene beauty to the morning light. For those considering how to dress, layering is key; a light jacket paired with a breathable shirt will offer comfort against the fluctuating temperatures. Given these inviting conditions, it’s an ideal time for a contemplative stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely visit to one of the local cafes, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the cool sea air. Conversations are likely to flow as freely as the light, making for a wonderfully engaging start to the day.
